abstract: With jet fighters overhead, it was easy to be distracted at the Farnborough International Airshow last week. But for executives, there were distractions on the ground, too.
snippet: With jet fighters overhead, it was easy to be distracted at the Farnborough International Airshow last week. But for executives, there were distractions on the ground, too.
lead_paragraph: With jet fighters and jumbo jets doing maneuvers overhead, it was easy to be distracted at the Farnborough International Airshow, which was held in England last week. But for executives, there were distractions on the ground, too.

headline.main: At an Air Show, Competing With the Roars and the Ringtones
headline.print_headline: At an Air Show, Competing With the Roars and the Ringtones

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: European Aeronautic Defense and Space Co

byline.original: By MICHELINE MAYNARD,  ELIZABETH OLSON,  PATRICIA R. OLSEN and MICHELLE LEDER
